scripts.clean: node -e "const{execSync}=require('child_process');const os=require('os');[3000,3001,3002,3003,3004,3005].forEach(p=>{try{if(os.platform()==='win32'){const r=execSync('netstat -ano -p tcp',{encoding:'utf8'});r.split('\n').filter(l=>l.includes(':'+p+' ')&&l.includes('LISTENING')).forEach(l=>{const pid=l.trim().split(/\s+/).pop();if(pid&&pid!=='0'){try{execSync('taskkill /F /PID '+pid,{stdio:'ignore'});console.log('Killed PID '+pid+' on port '+p)}catch{}}});}else{try{const pid=execSync('lsof -ti:'+p,{encoding:'utf8'}).trim();if(pid){execSync('kill -9 '+pid);console.log('Killed PID '+pid+' on port '+p)}}catch{}}}catch{}});const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function rm(d){if(fs.existsSync(d)){fs.rmSync(d,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('Cleared '+d)}}rm('.next');console.log('Done')"
